title: Going to a champ a day for 7 days here, keep your eyes peeled
body:
I want you to give me ideas for positions and type of champ (assassain, mage, etc.). feel free to suggest names also

EDIT: it means create a champ a day for 7 days

replies.body: I menat a character creation once a day, i already do both of those lol, galio and karma are amzing, sorry for the miscommunication, i figured that it was in palyer creations you would be logical enough to understand it was creating a champ a day but apparently not
Play jungle Karma. Do it. Hate yourself.
Play Galio support for a day!
